title: Is there a problem with LoL servers in EUNE?
body: I experience high ping up to 1.3k.The thing is that I tested everything: can watch YT 1080p, torrent speed as always, Ookla speed test(31 ms) and the speed as always.Yet I have 60-120-300-400-800-1000-1300 ping the entire game.Tested my ping too google.com in CMD and it came avg 43 MS, teste with leagueoflegends.com and all the requests timed out.What is the problem?

replies.body:
It sounds like you might be experiencing some issues with routing if it's only having timing out when reaching us. There could be a lot of different things that are blocking that, so let's start small and try some troubleshooting options to find a solution.

To start, I'd suggest trying to power cycle your router, then follow it with manually forwarding any ports that LoL needs. Steps for that can be found [**on our guide  over here**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#wq6). Go ahead and try some games and some speed tests if you prefer and see if your ping remains stable in each of them, and let me know the results!
I have a problem atm im in never ending game 70 min or so game is not ending and i cannot reconect last 30 mins of the game got dc... so i guess servers are down or something
